member.name: T:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.AccessLevel
member.summary: Defines the Dropbox API access levels.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.AccessLevel.AppFolder
member.summary: Application only needs access to a single folder within the user's Dropbox (recommended).

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.AccessLevel.Full
member.summary: Application needs access to the user's entire Dropbox.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaEntry
member.summary: Represents a single entry in a delta page.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaEntry.Path
member.summary:
Gets or sets the lower-cased path of the entry.
Value is lower-cased because Dropbox treats file names in a case-insensitive but case-preserving way. The Metadata property has the original case-preserved path.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaEntry.Metadata
member.summary:
Gets or sets the metadata information for the entry to update your local state.
If , it means that this path should not exist on your Dropbox's copy of the file system. Otherwise, it means that Dropbox has a file/folder at this path with the given metadata.

remarks.para: If , indicates that there is no file/folder at the given path. To update your local state to match, anything at path and all its children should be deleted. Deleting a folder in your Dropbox will sometimes send down a single deleted entry for that folder, and sometimes separate entries for the folder and all child paths. If your local state doesn't have anything at path, ignore this entry.

If not , indicates that there is a file/folder at the given path. You should add the entry to your local path. To correctly process delta entries:
If the new entry includes parent folders that don't yet exist in your local state, create those parent folders in your local state.
If the new entry is a file, replace whatever your local state has at path with the new entry.
If the new entry is a folder, check what your local state has at path. If it's a file, replace it with the new entry. If it's a folder, apply the new entry to the folder, but do not modify the folder's children.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaPage
member.summary: Represents a page of delta entries returned by 'Delta(string cursor)' method.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaPage.Cursor
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value that encodes the latest information that has been returned. It is used to keep track of your current state.
On the next call to 'Delta(string cursor)' method, pass in this value to return delta entries that have been recorded since this cursor was returned.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaPage.HasMore
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not more entries are available.
If you can call 'Delta(string cursor)' method again immediately to retrieve those entries. If , then wait for at least five minutes (preferably longer) before checking again.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaPage.Reset
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not to clear your local state before processing the delta entries.
Always on the initial call to 'Delta(string cursor)' method (i.e. when no cursor is passed in). Otherwise, it is in rare situations, such as after server or account maintenance, or if a user deletes their app folder.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaPage.Entries
member.summary:
Gets or sets the list of delta entries.
Apply these entries to your local state to catch up with the Dropbox server's state.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError
member.summary: The enumeration is used by the class to indicate what kind of error caused the exception.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.BadParameter
member.summary: Bad request parameter.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.NotAuthorized
member.summary: Bad or expired OAuth token.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.OperationNotPermitted
member.summary: Invalid operation attempted.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.PathNotFound
member.summary: File or folder path not found.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.TooManyEntries
member.summary: Too many metadata entries to return.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.ChunkedEncodingNotSupported
member.summary: Chunked encoding not supported.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.ThumbnailNotSupported
member.summary: Thumbnail cannot be created for the input file.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.Server
member.summary: Internal server error.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.ServerDown
member.summary: Server is down or is being upgraded.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.ServerOverloadedOrRateLimitExceeded
member.summary: Server is overloaded with request or the rate limit has been exceeded.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxApiError.StorageQuotaExceeded
member.summary: User is over quota.

member.author: Bruno Baia

The Dropbox error.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: A message about the exception.
The inner exception that is the cause of the current exception.

member.summary: Gets the Dropbox error.

member.summary: Gets or sets the user's unique Dropbox ID

member.summary: Gets or sets the user's email address.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxProfile.ReferralLink
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's referral link.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxProfile.Country
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's ISO country code, if available.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxProfile.Quota
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's quota (in bytes).

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxProfile.QuotaNormal
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's used quota outside of shared folders (in bytes).

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DropboxProfile.QuotaShared
member.summary: Gets or sets the user's used quota in shared folders (in bytes).

member.name: T:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry
member.summary: Represents metadata information about a file or folder.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.Size
member.summary: Gets or sets a human-readable description of the file size (translated by locale).

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.Bytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the file size in bytes.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.IsDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the given entry is a folder or not.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.IsDeleted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the given entry is deleted (only included if deleted files are being returned).

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.Revision
member.summary:
Gets or sets a unique identifier for the current revision of a file.
This field can be used to detect changes and avoid conflicts.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.Hash
member.summary: Gets or sets the hash of a folder's metadata useful in later calls to GetMetadata(). May be .

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.ThumbExists
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the file is an image and can be converted to a thumbnail via the GetThumbnails() method.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.Icon
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the icon used to illustrate the file type in Dropbox's icon library.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.ModifiedDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the last time the file was modified on Dropbox, in the standard date format ( for the root folder).

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.Root
member.summary:
Gets or sets the root or top-level folder depending on your access level (Folder or Full access).
All paths returned are relative to this root level. Permitted values are either 'dropbox' or 'app_folder'.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.MimeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the file's MIME type. May be .

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.Path
member.summary: Gets or sets the file or folder's path relative to root.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry.Contents
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of children entries if this is a directory. May be .

member.summary: Gets or sets the reference value.

member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.

member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.summary: Asynchronously creates a reference to another user's Dropbox file that can be used to copy files directly between two Dropbox accounts (with permission from both users) using the method. No need to download and re-upload files.
member.param: The path to the file you want a reference.
The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a reference to another user's Dropbox file.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

The destination file path, including the new name for the file, relative to root.

member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.summary: Asynchronously uploads a file.
member.param: The file resource to be uploaded.
The path to the file you want to write to, relative to root. This parameter should not point to a folder.
The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a metadata for the uploaded file.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.IDropbox.UploadFileAsync(Spring.IO.IResource,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Action{Spring.Rest.Client.RestOperationCompletedEventArgs{Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry}})
member.summary: Asynchronously uploads a file.
member.param: The file resource to be uploaded.
The path to the file you want to write to, relative to root. This parameter should not point to a folder.
If , the existing file will be overwritten by the new one. If , the new file will be automatically renamed. The new name can be obtained from the returned metadata.
The revision of the file you're editing or null if this is a new upload. If matches the latest version of the file on the user's Dropbox, that file will be replaced.
The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a metadata for the uploaded file.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a object containing the file's content and metadata.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.summary: Asynchronously downloads part of a file and its metadata.

The number of bytes of the part file.
The revision of the file to retrieve, or for the latest version.

member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.IDropbox.DeltaAsync(System.String,System.Action{Spring.Rest.Client.RestOperationCompletedEventArgs{Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaPage}})
member.summary:
Asynchronously keeps up with changes to files and folders in a user's Dropbox.
You can periodically call this method to get a list of metadatas, which are instructions on how to update your local state to match the server's state.
member.param:
A value that is used to keep track of your current state.
On the first call, you should pass in . On subsequent calls, pass in the cursor value returned by the previous call.

The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a single delta page of results.
The 's HasMore property will tell you whether the server has more pages of results to return. If the server doesn't have more results, wait for at least five minutes (preferably longer) and poll again.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.IDropbox.GetMetadataAsync(System.String,System.Action{Spring.Rest.Client.RestOperationCompletedEventArgs{Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry}})
member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves file or folder metadata.
member.param: The Dropbox path to the file or folder, relative to root.
The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a metadata for the file or folder.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.summary: Asynchronously retrieves file or folder metadata. May return if an hash is provided through parameters.

The parameters for retrieving file and folder metadata.
The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a metadata for the file or folder.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

The search string. Must be at least three characters long.

The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a list of metadata entries for any matching files and folders.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.IDropbox.Locale
member.summary:
Gets or sets the locale parameter to specify language settings of content responses.
Uses IETF language tag (ex: "pt-BR" for Brazilian Portuguese).
Default is for Dropbox server's locale.

member.name: P:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.IDropbox.RestOperations
member.summary: Gets the underlying object allowing for consumption of Dropbox endpoints that may not be otherwise covered by the API binding.
member.remarks: The object returned is configured to include an OAuth "Authorization" header on all requests.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Impl.DropboxErrorHandler
member.summary: Implementation of the that handles errors from Dropbox's REST API, interpreting them into appropriate exceptions.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.name: M:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Impl.DropboxErrorHandler.HandleError(System.Uri,Spring.Http.HttpMethod,Spring.Http.HttpResponseMessage{System.Byte[]})
member.summary:
Handles the error in the given response.
This method is only called when HasError() method has returned .
member.remarks: This implementation throws appropriate exception if the response status code is a client code error (4xx) or a server code error (5xx).
member.param: The request URI.
The request method.
The response message with the error.

member.name: T:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Impl.DropboxFileHttpMessageConverter
member.summary:
Implementation of that can read Dropbox file's content and metadata.
Reads file's content from message body and file's metadata from HTTP header 'x-dropbox-metadata'.
member.author: Bruno Baia

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the .
member.param: A to use for converting custom types.

member.summary: Indicates whether the given class is supported by this converter.

The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a reference to another user's Dropbox file.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Impl.DropboxTemplate.UploadFileAsync(Spring.IO.IResource,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Action{Spring.Rest.Client.RestOperationCompletedEventArgs{Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Entry}})
member.summary: Asynchronously uploads a file.
member.param: The file resource to be uploaded.
The path to the file you want to write to, relative to root. This parameter should not point to a folder.
If , the existing file will be overwritten by the new one. If , the new file will be automatically renamed. The new name can be obtained from the returned metadata.
The revision of the file you're editing. If matches the latest version of the file on the user's Dropbox, that file will be replaced.
The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a metadata for the uploaded file.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.name: M:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.Impl.DropboxTemplate.DeltaAsync(System.String,System.Action{Spring.Rest.Client.RestOperationCompletedEventArgs{Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.DeltaPage}})
member.summary:
Asynchronously keeps up with changes to files and folders in a user's Dropbox.
You can periodically call this method to get a list of metadatas, which are instructions on how to update your local state to match the server's state.
member.param:
A value that is used to keep track of your current state.
On the first call, you should pass in . On subsequent calls, pass in the cursor value returned by the previous call.

The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a single delta page of results.
The 's HasMore property will tell you whether the server has more pages of results to return. If the server doesn't have more results, wait for at least five minutes (preferably longer) and poll again.
member.returns: A instance that allows to cancel the asynchronous operation.
member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

The search string. Must be at least three characters long.
The maximum numbers of file entries to retrieve. The maximum and default value is 1000.
If , then files and folders that have been deleted will also be included in the search.
The 'Action<>' to perform when the asynchronous request completes. Provides a list of metadata entries for any matching files and folders.

member.exception: If there is an error while communicating with Dropbox.

Gets or sets the locale parameter to specify language settings of content responses.

member.remarks: The object returned is configured to include an OAuth "Authorization" header on all requests.

member.name: F:Spring.Social.Dropbox.Api.ThumbnailSize.Mini
